description:
In the xenapi vmops codebase, a code duplication has been discovered:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/cd9d8e45c6b8a747069d0cec2c1ff0360ebe6d73/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py#L281

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/cd9d8e45c6b8a747069d0cec2c1ff0360ebe6d73/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py#L383

This code duplication should be eliminated
title: xenapi: code duplication in vmops

comments.content:
In the xenapi vmops codebase, a code duplication has been discovered:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/cd9d8e45c6b8a747069d0cec2c1ff0360ebe6d73/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py#L281

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/cd9d8e45c6b8a747069d0cec2c1ff0360ebe6d73/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py#L383

This code duplication should be eliminated
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mate-lakat

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/39732
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/844843c80a31447e83d273b4cb95158789f790f2
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 844843c80a31447e83d273b4cb95158789f790f2
Author: Mate Lakat <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Aug 1 16:00:52 2013 +0100

    xenapi: Reduce code duplication in vmops
    
    A code fragment that creates kernel and ramdisk appeared in several
    locations in vmops. This eliminates that duplication by wrapping it in
    a new _create_kernel_and_ramdisk() method.
    
    Fixes bug 1207474
    
    Change-Id: Id317477cb278aa1b6d038516e202aff1bd6129a6
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: Doh, I had this up in one of my patches already, all good!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~johngarbutt
